short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize your ChatGPT conversations into folders and more...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Revolutionize your chat organization with this dynamic and intuitive tool, designed exclusively for ChatGPT. Immerse yourself in a world where your conversations are not just stored, but meticulously organized and effortlessly accessible.

Local Privacy: Enjoy peace of mind knowing your data stays securely on your device. 

Hierarchical Folders: Craft a personalized system with folders and sub-folders.
 
Easy Interface: Organize your chats with an easy, intuitive interface. 

Customizable Color Schemes: Brighten your chat overview with custom-colored folders. 

Smart Automation: Let the system auto-sort your Custom GPTs into dedicated folders. ðŸ¤–

Bookmark Essentials: Pin your most important chats for quick access.
